name: Beloved's That's My Word
description: Beloved's Rene Hidalgo uses St. Germain and Yellow Chartreuse in this refined riff on The Last Word cocktail.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce London Dry Gin, such as Beefeater
3/4 ounce fresh lime juice, from about 1 lime
Grapefruit twist (about the size of a silver dollar, see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add gin, Chartreuse, St. Germain, lime juice, and grapefruit twist and shake until well chilled, about 15 seconds.
Place cherry in chilled coupe glass. Double strain cocktail into glass and serve immediately.
